  • Uses of AppContext in com.sc2002.repositories

    Methods in com.sc2002.repositories with parameters of type AppContext
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<BTOProjectModel>
    ProjectRepo.findByFilter(AppContext appContext)
    Finds projects based on the filter criteria set in the current user's ProjectViewFilterModel.
    List<BTOProjectModel>
    ProjectRepo.findPersonalByFilter(AppContext appContext)
    Finds projects relevant to the current user (managed projects for officers/managers) based on the filter criteria set in their ProjectViewFilterModel.
    boolean
    ProjectRepo.hasDateConflict(LocalDate newOpeningDate, LocalDate newClosingDate, AppContext appContext)
    Checks if there is a date conflict between the specified opening and closing dates and the existing projects managed by the current user.

    Handles the menu flow for creating a new BTO project.
    private void

    Handles the menu flow for deleting a BTO project managed by the user.
    private void
    HDBManagerView.editBTOProjectMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for editing details of an existing BTO project managed by the user.
    private void
    HDBManagerView.editEnquiryMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for viewing and replying to enquiries, prioritizing those related to projects managed by the current user.
    private void
    HDBOfficerView.generateApplicationReceipt(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for an officer to generate a receipt for a specific applicant's application within the project they are managing.
    private void
    ApplicantView.generateReceiptMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for generating and displaying a receipt for a successful application (typically after flat selection, although current implementation checks only for application existence).
    private void
    HDBOfficerView.generateReceiptMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for an officer generating and displaying a receipt for their personal successful application.
    private void
    HDBManagerView.generateReportMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for generating various filtered reports for a specific project.
    private void
    HDBManagerView.getAllBTOProjectMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for viewing all BTO projects (regardless of manager) and allowing the manager to select one to view details.
    private void
    HDBManagerView.getAllEnquiryMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for viewing all enquiries across all projects.
    private void
    HDBManagerView.getBTOProjectByUserIDMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for viewing details of a specific BTO project managed by the user.
    void
    HDBManagerView.HDBManagerMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Displays the main menu for the HDB Manager user and handles user input for navigation.
    void
    HDBOfficerView.HDBOfficerMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Displays the main menu for the HDB Officer user and handles user input for navigation.
    private void
    HDBOfficerView.manageEnquiriesMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for an officer to view and reply to enquiries related to the project they are managing.
    private void
    ProjectView.printPersonalProjectMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Prints a list of BTO projects managed by the current user (Manager) that match the filters currently set in the user's profile within the AppContext.
    private void
    ProjectView.printProjectMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Prints a list of all BTO projects that match the filters currently set in the user's profile within the AppContext.
    void
    ProjectView.projectManagingMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Displays information about the BTO project currently being managed by the logged-in HDB Officer or Manager.
    private void
    HDBOfficerView.registerForProjectMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for an officer registering their interest to join a specific BTO project team.
    private void
    HDBManagerView.rejectApplicationWithdrawalMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for rejecting pending withdrawal requests for BTO applications within a specific project.
    private void
    HDBManagerView.rejectBTOApplicationMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for rejecting pending BTO applications for a specific project.
    private void
    HDBManagerView.rejectOfficerRegistrationMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for rejecting officer registration requests for a specific project.
    private void
    ProjectView.setFilterMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for setting or resetting the Neighborhood and Flat Type filters used for viewing projects.
    void
    mainAppView.startMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Starts the main application loop, displaying the main menu and directing the user to login, registration, or role-specific menus based on their actions.
    private void
    ApplicantView.submitEnquiryMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for submitting an enquiry about a specific BTO project.
    private void
    HDBOfficerView.submitEnquiryMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for an officer submitting an enquiry about a specific BTO project (acting as an applicant).
    private void
    HDBManagerView.toggleProjectVisibilityMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for toggling the visibility (public/private) of a BTO project managed by the user.
    private void
    HDBOfficerView.viewAndUpdateBookings(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for an officer to view and update bookings for applicants within the project they are managing.
    private void
    ApplicantView.viewApplicationStatusMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for viewing the status of the applicant's BTO application.
    private void
    HDBOfficerView.viewApplicationStatusMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for an officer viewing the status of their personal BTO application.
    private void
    ApplicantView.viewMyEnquiriesMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for viewing, editing, or deleting enquiries submitted by the applicant.
    private void
    HDBOfficerView.viewMyEnquiriesMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for an officer viewing, editing, or deleting their personal enquiries (acting as an applicant).
    void
    ProjectView.viewProjectFilterableMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Displays the main menu for viewing projects, allowing users to change filters or view projects based on current filters.
    private void
    HDBOfficerView.viewRegistrationStatusMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for an officer viewing the status of their registration request to join a project team.
